label: 遁世者, 遁世僧
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
見出し読み: とんせいしゃ, とんせいそう
説明文: world-renouncing ascetics, as opposed to regular monks affiliated with a particular temple; they were sometimes but not always ordained.
